author: sky.cactus
content: I feel like Ethereum could be greatly improved if someone just built a layer 2 solution for Tether specifically.

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't know how they consume so much gas every block, I don't know a single person that actually uses them... and everyone I talk to thinks they are terrible... but despite that they are reliably the top guzzler.

author: rinku6993
content: Uniswap V2 is highest gas guzzler this time. Yield Farming tokens cause of it ???

author: sky.cactus
content: Uniswap is actually useful though and there are a bunch of real humans who use it.  Tether is this weird anomaly where it is unclear who the users are and it doesn't seem to provide any more value than the other options out there that see *way* less gas usage like USDC.

author: rinku6993
content: What will be done if the Block size increase and reduce the miner revenue. ?

author: rinku6993
content: Will help to reduce pending transaction/congestion ?

author: afdudley
content: does anyone know of a metatx thing that actually works right now, I have DAI/USDC, no ETH and I need to make a transaction.

author: sky.cactus
content: DAI does have support for signed actions (e.g., transfers).  I'm not sure what UIs support this though (which I suspect is what you are looking for?)

content: (USDC does as well as of last week or something IIRC)
